content: quote: Former Gov. Rod Blagojevich has made a deal to star in NBC's upcoming summer reality show I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here, the network confirms. . . NBC has been looking for household names for its version of the U.K. hit, which launches June 1. ... . . According to the Chicago Tribune, Blagojevich's attorney told a federal judge Tuesday that he will file a request to loosen his client's travel restrictions to participate in the show, which will be shot in Costa Rica. Blago was indicted April 1 on 16 counts -- 11 counts of wire fraud, three of extortion, one of racketeering and one of lying to federal investigators. He has plead not guilty. <more> "http://www.thrfeed.com/2009/04/blagojevich-nbcs-celebrity-.html"
quote: Former Gov. Rod Blagojevich has made a deal to star in NBC's upcoming summer reality show I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here, the network confirms. . . Blago was indicted April 1 on 16 counts -- 11 counts of wire fraud, three of extortion, one of racketeering and one of lying to federal investigators. He has plead not guilty. <more> "http://www.thrfeed.com/2009/04/blagojevich-nbcs-celebrity-.html"
title: NBC to Feature Scumbag Politician
